          <title>
            <string language="de">Demokratie</string>
            <string language="en">Demoracy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demoracy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demoracy</string>

          </title>
          <language>tr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Eine kurze Beschreibung der Demokratie und der wichtigsten Ereignisse in der Geschichte der Demokratie.</string>
            <string language="en">A brief description of de-mocracy and important events in the history of democracy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Geschichte der Demokratie</string>
            <string language="en">history of democracy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">wichtige Ereignisse in der Demokratie</string>
            <string language="en">important events in democracy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une courte description de démocratie et 
d'événements importants dans l'histoire de la démocratie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma descrição breve da democracia e de eventos 
importantes no history da democracia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una descrizione sommaria della democrazia e degli
eventi importanti nella storia della democrazia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>

σημαντικών γεγονότων στην ιστορία της δημοκρατίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una descripción abreviada de la democracia y de 
acontecimientos importantes en la historia de la democracia.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire de démocratie</string>
